name: Gabriel
greetingText: Happy Birthday! (To the best Lao Ban)
wishText: May we always be in your heart! ;)
text1: Here are some wishes we have for you! :D

outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
